dcterms:creator: Diane DePanfilis
dcterms:description: A dataset containing contact notes written by caseworkers, supervisors, and service providers in the Department of Human Services (DHS) in an anonymous USA county, used to investigate racial disparities in child protective services.
dcterms:title: CPS Contact Notes

dcterms:creator: Children’s Bureau
dcterms:description: A dataset providing statistics and information on child maltreatment cases in the United States, used to analyze trends and disparities in child welfare.
dcterms:title: Child Maltreatment Data

dcterms:creator: Özlem Uzuner
Brett R South
Shuying Shen
Scott L DuVall
dcterms:description: A dataset used in the i2b2/VA challenge focusing on concepts, assertions, and relations in clinical text, relevant for evaluating NLP models in healthcare.
dcterms:title: i2b2/VA Challenge Data

dcterms:creator: Eduard Hovy
Mitchell Marcus
Martha Palmer
Lance Ramshaw
Ralph Weischedel
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a large annotated corpus for various NLP tasks, including coreference resolution and named entity recognition.
dcterms:title: OntoNotes

dcterms:creator: Shubhanshu Mishra
Sijun He
Luca Belli
dcterms:description: A dataset used for assessing demographic bias in named entity recognition systems, focusing on the performance of models across different demographic groups.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-03

dcterms:creator: Jude Mary Cénat
Sara-Emilie McIntee
Joana N. Mukunzi
Pari-Gole Noorishad
dcterms:description: A dataset that examines the overrepresentation of Black children in the child welfare system, providing insights into systemic issues and disparities.
dcterms:title: Child Protective Services Data
